lines.text: To flood the land to make more room for the ocean...
It sounded a lot cooler in my head, and it does have its flaws...but I'm still going through with it!
As the head of Team Aqua, I have dedicated myself to thwarting Magma's plans.
They want to expand the land, but everything depends on the sea, so we're doing the opposite of them!
You wouldn't understand, so stay out of our way!
